summary: A woman who has been married and divorced five times comes back to her small hometown, where she proceeds to complicate, and potentially destroy, the marriage of her childhood boyfriend.
cast: Kay Francis|Bruce Cabot|Helen Mack|Jerome Cowan|Craig Reynolds|Ruth Lee|Jean Fenwick|Mary Gordon|Larry Olsen|Johnny Calkins|Jonathan Hale|Addison Richards|Leonard Mudie|Reid Kilpatrick|Virginia Wave|Napoleon Simpson|Pierre Watkin|Edward Biby|Jay Eaton|Eric Wilton
keywords: male female relationship|husband wife relationship|dysfunctional marriage|father son relationship|nagging wife
title: Divorce
